New Records: Oklahoma City Thunder set a new franchise record with their 15th straight win, breaking the previous record set by the Seattle SuperSonics in 1996.
Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 33 points and 11 rebounds.
Jayson Tatum had 26 points and 10 rebounds for the Boston Celtics.
Jaylen Brown scored 21 points but went scoreless on 0-for-7 shooting in the second half.
Lu Dort scored 11 points and made all three of his shots from beyond the arc in the fourth quarter.
Oklahoma City held Boston to a season-low 27 points in the second half.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Oklahoma City Thunder improved to 30-5 and have not lost a game that counted in the standings since Dec. 1.
The Thunder's loss to the Milwaukee Bucks in the NBA Cup final does not count on the team’s record.
